name: Prismatic Shard
text:
Uses (4 brilliance).
[reaction] When a scenario card effect would discard any number of cards from your hand, exhaust Prismatic Shard and spend 1 brilliance: Ignore that effect and draw that many cards, instead.

name: Little Sylvie
text: [reaction] When Little Sylvie is discarded from your hand or deck: Play it (paying its cost). [reaction] When a scenario card effect would discard a card from your hand or deck, exhaust Little Sylvie: Place that card on top of your deck, instead.

name: Ajax
text:
Your first action each round does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[action] Exhaust Ajax: Move. Either move twice, or choose any [[Field]] location and move to it.
[action] If Ajax is at your location: Take control of him. Any player at Ajax's location may trigger this ability.

name: Cosmic Emissary
text: Massive. Cannot make attacks of opportunity. Forced – When you successfully fight or evade this enemy: Instead of damaging or exhausting it, this enemy does not attack during the enemy phase this round.

name: Cosmic Emissary
text: Massive. Retaliate. Cannot make attacks of opportunity. Forced – When you successfully fight or evade this enemy: Instead of damaging or exhausting it, this enemy does not attack during the enemy phase this round.

name: Cosmic Emissary
text: Massive. Alert. Cannot make attacks of opportunity. Forced – When you successfully fight or evade this enemy: Instead of damaging or exhausting it, this enemy does not attack during the enemy phase this round.

name: Cosmic Emissary
text: Massive. Cannot make attacks of opportunity. Forced – When you successfully fight or evade this enemy: Instead of damaging or exhausting it, this enemy does not attack during the enemy phase this round.

name: The Hemlock Curse
text: This skill's icons subtract from your skill value instead of adding to it. If this skill test fails, discard each card in your hand. Forced - At the end of your turn, if The Hemlock Curse is in your hand: Discard 1 card at random from your hand.

name: Mother Rachel
text: While you control Mother Rachel, you have 1 additional arcane slot. [action]: Parley. Test [willpower](2). If you succeed, ([codex] 1). Forced - After Mother Rachel is defeated: Set her aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease her Relationship Level.

name: Leah Atwood
text: While you control Leah Atwood, you get +1 [combat]. [action]: Parley. Test [combat](2). If you succeed, ([codex] 2). Forced - After Leah Atwood is defeated. Set her aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease her Relationship Level.

name: Simeon Atwood
text: While you control Simeon Atwood, you get +1 [agility]. [action]: Parley. Test [agility](2). If you succeed, ([codex] 3). Forced - After Simeon Atwood is defeated: Set him aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease his Relationship Level.

name: William Hemlock
text: While you control William Hemlock, you get +1 [intellect]. [action]: Parley. Test [intellect](2). If you succeed, ([codex] 4). Forced - After William Hemlock is defeated. Set him aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease his Relationship Level.

name: River Hawthorne
Gideon Mizrah
text: While you control Gideon Mizrah, you have 1 additional accessory slot. [action] [action]: Parley. ([codex] 6). Forced - After Gideon Mizrah is defeated: Set him aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease his Relationship Level.

name: Judith Park
text: While you control Judith Park, you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to fight. [action] Spend X resources, where X is the current day number: Parley. ([codex] 7). Forced - After Judith Park is defeated: Set her aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease her Relationship Level.

name: Theo Peters
text: While you control Theo Peters, you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to move. [action] Choose and discard X cards from your hand, where X is the current day number: Parley. ([codex] 8). Forced - After Theo Peters is defeated: Set him aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease his Relationship Level.

name: Bertie Musgrave
text: While you control Bertie Musgrave, you get +1 health and + 1 sanity [fast] Take either 1 damage or 1 horror and exhaust Bertie Musgrave: Parley. Draw 1 card ([codex] Ω). Forced - After Bertie Musgrave is defeated: Set him aside, out of play.

flavor: "If it's survival of the fittest, I intend to survive."
name: Dr. Rosa Marquez
text: While you control Dr. Rosa Marquez, you get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility]. [reaction] After you discover the last clue at your location ([codex] Ω).

flavor: "Change is inevitable. The question is how we weather it."
name: Helen Peters
text: (Day [day]) you get +1 [combat]. (Night [night]) you get +1 [agility]. [reaction] After you enter a location, exhaust Helen Peters and deal 1 damage to her: Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location and automatically evade it.

flavor: The stone is worn and smooth.
name: Worry Rock
text:
Fast.
[reaction] When a scenario card effect discards Worry Rock from your hand: Draw 3 cards. (Limit once per game.)

flavor: A traditional Abenaki doll made to look like Mother Rachel.
name: Corn Husk Doll
text:
Fast. Uses (3 wishes).
[reaction] When a [skull] or [tablet] token is revealed at your location, spend 1 wish and exhaust Corn Husk Doll: Treat that token as a [cultist] token instead.

name: The Pearl Diary
text: (Day [day]) You get +1 [intellect]. (Night [night]) You get +1 [willpower]. [reaction] After an investigator at your location draws a [[Blight]] or [[Power]] card from the encounter deck, exhaust The Pearl Diary: That investigator draws 1 card.
